name: Rolkeroon: On The Move Demo Build
name_original: Rolkeroon: On The Move Demo Build
description:
Are You Ready To Explore Klor's Fields Of Greens For Some Powerful And Dangerous Rolkeroons? Pick Your Starter: Rockichu, Sorreed Or Frozergy To Start Your Journey In Klor's Fields And Befriend Every Rolk You Meet!
Instructions: Arrow Keys To Move. Walk Into The Black Question Mark To Attempt To Befriend A Rolkeroon. Click On The Incapitorb (Green Ball) When Capturing A Rolkeroon. When In A Battle, Click On Your Rolkeroon To Motivate It To Defeat The Enemy.
Join The Official Rolkeroon Discord For Updates On The Yet To Be Finished Game That Is On It's Way: https://discord.gg/Bj836VqngE
If You Have Reddit, There's A Subreddit Too: rolkeroon (reddit.com)
